tit.cmt: an を削除しました。タイトルであるため）

sen.j: 食用菊（しょくようぎく）とはキクの一種で、特に食品として栽培されている菊を指す。
sen.e: Shokuyo-giku is a kind of chrysanthemum which is especially grown as food.
Shokuyo-giku is a kind of chrysanthemum which is especially grown as food.
Shokuyo-giku is a kind of chrysanthemum which is especially grown as food.

sen.j: 食菊とも。
sen.e: It is also called shokugiku.
It is also called shokugiku.
It is also called shokugiku.

sen.j: 料理のつまに使われるつま菊などの小輪種の他、花びらのみを食用とする大輪種がある。
sen.e: There are small-flowered variety including chrysanthemum garnish which is used as garnish for a dish, as well as big-flowered variety whose petals are only edible.
As well as the small-flowered varieties such as garnish chrysanthemum used for dishes, there are big-flowered varieties only whose petals are eaten.
sen.cmt: 文脈より修正しました。（「つま菊」がリストのものと異なりますが、品種であるためこのように修正しました）
sen.e: As well as the small-flowered varieties such as garnish chrysanthemum used for dishes, there are big-flowered varieties only whose petals are eaten.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 観賞用の菊に比べて苦みが少なく、甘みがある。
sen.e: It is less bitter compared to chrysanthemum for ornamental use and is a little sweet.
It is less bitter compared to the chrysanthemum for ornamental use and has a sugary taste.
sen.cmt: the を挿入しました。「甘みがある」という部分を修正しました。
sen.e: It is less bitter compared to the chrysanthemum for ornamental use and has a sugary taste.

sen.j: 茹でてお浸しにしたり酢の物や胡桃合え、天ぷらや吸い物に用いられる。
sen.e: It is boiled and eaten with soy sauce dressing, used for vinegared food, aemono (chopped fish, shellfish or vegetables, dressed with (miso or other) sauce) with walnuts, tenpura (Japanese deep-fried dish), and suimono (clear soup).

It is boiled and eaten with soy sauce dressing, or used for vinegared food, aemono (chopped fish, shellfish or vegetables, dressed with [miso or other] sauce) with walnuts, tenpura (Japanese deep-fried dish), and suimono (clear soup).
sen.cmt: or を挿入しました。(())→([]) と修正しました。
sen.e: It is boiled and eaten with soy sauce dressing, or used for vinegared food, aemono (chopped fish, shellfish or vegetables, dressed with [miso or other] sauce) with walnuts, tenpura (Japanese deep-fried dish), and suimono (clear soup).

sen.j: また花びらを湯がいたり蒸した後に海苔のように薄く四角い形に乾燥させた「菊海苔」「干し菊」などの加工品がある。
sen.e: Also there are processed food such as "kikunori" (dried chrysanthemum sheet) or "hoshigiku" (dried chrysanthemum) which are made by boiling or steaming petals and drying them in thin and square shape like dried seaweed.

Also there are processed food such as 'kikunori' (dried chrysanthemum sheet) or 'hoshigiku' (dried chrysanthemum), which are made by boiling or steaming petals and drying them in thin and square shape like dried seaweed.
sen.cmt: 引用符を修正しました。カンマを挿入しました。
sen.e: Also there are processed food such as 'kikunori' (dried chrysanthemum sheet) or 'hoshigiku' (dried chrysanthemum), which are made by boiling or steaming petals and drying them in thin and square shape like dried seaweed.

sen.j: つま菊を除きほとんどが山形県産である。
sen.e: Most are made in Yamagata prefecture except chrysanthemum garnish.
Most are made in Yamagata Prefecture except the chrysanthemum garnish.
sen.cmt: prefecture→Prefecture と修正しました。the を挿入しました。
sen.e: Most are made in Yamagata Prefecture except the chrysanthemum garnish.

sen.j: 山形県内各地、青森県八戸市など東北地方、新潟県の中越地方から下越地方などで栽培される。
sen.e: They are grown in various areas in Tohoku region including Yamagata Prefecture and Hachinohe-shi, Aomori Prefecture, as well as in Chuetsu (middle) and Kaetsu (southern) regions of Niigata Prefecture.

They are grown in various areas in Tohoku region including Yamagata Prefecture and Hachinohe City, Aomori Prefecture, as well as in Chuetsu (middle) and Kaetsu (southern) regions of Niigata Prefecture.
sen.cmt: Hachinohe-shi→Hachinohe City と修正しました。
sen.e: They are grown in various areas in Tohoku region including Yamagata Prefecture and Hachinohe City, Aomori Prefecture, as well as in Chuetsu (middle) and Kaetsu (southern) regions of Niigata Prefecture.

sen.j: 秋に収穫される。
sen.e: They are cropped in autumn.
They are cropped in autumn.
They are cropped in autumn.

sen.j: 大輪種にはうすむらさき色の小さな花をつける延命楽（もってのほか、かきのもとなど）や、黄色い花の阿房宮などの品種がある。
sen.e: Big flower variety includes Enmeiraku (such as Mottenohoka and Kakinomoto) which bears small violet flowers and Abokyu of yellow flowers.
Big flower varieties include Enmeiraku (such as Mottenohoka and Kakinomoto) which bears small violet flowers and Abokyu of yellow flowers.
sen.cmt: variety includes→varieties include と修正しました。
sen.e: Big flower varieties include Enmeiraku (such as Mottenohoka and Kakinomoto) which bears small violet flowers and Abokyu of yellow flowers.

sen.j: おもな品種
sen.e: Main Varieties
Main Varieties
Main Varieties

sen.j: 日本でポピュラーなのは次の2種である。
sen.e: In Japan the following two varieties are popular.
In Japan the following two varieties are popular.
In Japan the following two varieties are popular.

sen.j: 花が食材として売られているだけでなく、園芸店で苗木を売っていることもある。
sen.e: Not only their flowers are sold as food but young trees are sold at garden stores.
Not only their flowers are sold as food but young plants are sold at garden centers.
Not only their flowers are sold as food but young plants are sold at garden centers.

sen.j: 阿房宮（あぼうきゅう黄色の小輪種・八重咲き。
sen.e: Abokyu: yellow small double-petal flower variety.
Abokyu: yellow small-flowered variety, double-petal flower.
sen.cmt: 文の流れをよりスムースに修正しました。
sen.e: Abokyu: yellow small-flowered variety, double-petal flower.

sen.j: 刺身などの料理の妻や飾りなどによく使われている。
sen.e: It is often used as garnish for dishes such as sashimi.
It is often used as a garnish or decoration for dishes such as sashimi.
sen.cmt: a を挿入、「飾り」を補いました。
sen.e: It is often used as a garnish or decoration for dishes such as sashimi.

sen.j: もってのほか明るい赤紫色の中輪種。
sen.e: Mottenohoka: light reddish purple medium flower variety.
Mottenohoka: light reddish purple medium flower variety.
Mottenohoka: light reddish purple medium flower variety.

sen.j: 八重咲き。
sen.e: They have double-petal flowers.
They have double-petal flowers.
They have double-petal flowers.

sen.j: 山形の特産品で、酢の物などの料理に使われる。
sen.e: It is an indigenous product of Yamagata Prefecture and is used for dishes including vinegared food.
It is an indigenous product of Yamagata Prefecture and is used for dishes including vinegared food.
It is an indigenous product of Yamagata Prefecture and is used for dishes including vinegared food.

sen.j: 「もって菊」とも言う。
sen.e: It is also called "Mottegiku".
It is also called 'Mottegiku.'
sen.cmt: 引用符、ピリオドの位置を修正しました。
sen.e: It is also called 'Mottegiku.'
